description.value: Action Cost: 1 [Combat] action Range: 30 feet Frequency: Once per short rest Effect: Target within 30 feet makes [[/save type=will]] (your Charisma + Fire Mastery vs their Wisdom + Luck). If you win by 1+ successes, target is Frightened for 1 minute (they can repeat save each turn). The stolen power within you manifests as pure terror.
